name: A body, a dream, a regret

metadata.name: BDR #1
metadata.description:
A Body:  
35 years old, has lived in several states throughout Brazil and has always been passionate about photography. However, due to financial struggles aggravated by the COVID pandemic, she had to put the camera aside. Since then, concluded a flight attendant course and even worked at an aesthetician clinic.

In the end of 2022, after waking up blind and going through several medical exams, was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis.


A Dream: 
Moving to another country for a stable life.

A Regret: 
Not enough dedication to studying when the time was right.



BDR #1  
a body, a dream, a regret.  
A photojournalistic series in 52 chapters by Victor Ribeiro.
